title: *Pet Friendly*Heat & HW Incl*Laundry in Unit*Green B line*Dog/Cat OK*
posting_body: This 1 bed 1 bath unit is on the first floor.
Includes HEAT & HOT WATER & cooking gas.
There's laundry in the building & an elevator.
Pet's are ok for $50 a month extra each pet (breed restrictions).
Right directly on the Green B train line between the Sutherland & Warren St. stops.
Great for students commuting to BC or BU.
Also near several bus routes- 86, 501, 57, 65, as well as the Green C train line.
$25 a month storage units available in building.
Parking for rent $200 a month, or street parking.
Starry internet available for $50 a month.
Rent Includes:: Gas, Heat, Hot Water
